verbs.description: After [ARG0: Trump advisers Peter Navarro and Larry Kudlow] [V: used] [ARG1: the same talking point] [ARG2: over Justin Trudeau 's mild rebuke at the G-7 Summit] , it sounded very familiar to Cheryl Rofer , a nuclear security analyst .
